# Patterns of trade

```{r data, echo=FALSE}
# Data import
data <- read.csv("data/world-bank.csv") %>%
  slice(-c(6:10))
data <- data[-c(1:4)]

# Columns rename
names(data) <- c(1960:2020)

# Variables
gdp <- data[1, ]
merchExports <- data[2, ]
merchImports <- data[3, ]
goods_and_servicesExports <- data[4, ]
goods_and_servicesImports <- data[5, ]

# Important ratios
merchExportsGPD <- merchExports / gdp
merchImportsGPD <- merchImports / gdp
merchGDP <- (merchExports  + merchImports) / gdp
```
